name: Gravedigger (nosferathoo)
description:
You're a gravedigger - your job is to dig deep graves or not so deep, or relocate inhabitants from one grave to another - SKY IS THE LIMIT

Controls:

Arrows - Move

Space - Jump/WallJump

Ctrl - Dig (with arrows digs also up and down)

Shift - Grab near coffin

When you grab coffing it will show you on what depth it should be buried.

Game done for Ludum Dare Jam #48

All was done using Unity Bolt Visual Scripting - not even ONE line of code was written :)

It's quite unfinished/untested/unpolished but taking into consideration many DISTRACTIONS during this weekend and a total of maybe 14 hours I'm quite happy with the result. Some of the features i didn't had time to implement and was really looking into it was some enemies that you can just punch with the shovel, more platforming etc.

Music by: sawsquarenoise (https://freemusicarchive.org/music/sawsquarenoise/dojokratos/stage-3)

Background assets are from free packages.
